name: The Morok of Bralon
description:
The Morok of Bralon:

Wield the holy feces hurling lavatory brush in order to cleanse the world of the abysmal evil that sullied its face!

Gameplay:

  • Kill all enemies in a level to open a portal to the next one
  • The number on your magic cookingpot helmet of brainwave absoprtion indicates how many enemies are still alive
  • Dodge the organs and turds that fill up the rooms

Controls:

  • Aim: move mouse across mousepad
  • Shoot (single): press left mouse button with finger
  • Shoot (continuous): hold right mouse button with toe
  • Walk: w,a,s,d or arrow keys
  • Zoom: scroll mouse wheel
  • Pause: space

Password:

Secret passwords can be found at certain places in the game. They serve as checkpoints. Type in a correct secret password in the main menu to start at the place where the password was found.
